string.text: Siege Outfit
Loaded {DisplayName}
Enables using Siege Loadouts. Otherwise will always use Battle Loadout. [ Default: ON ]
Enable Siege Loadouts
General Settings
Use armor from Siege loadout in Tournaments. Otherwise will use armor from Battle loadout. [ Default: OFF ]
Use Siege Armor In Tournaments
Use Siege Loadout in Hideout missions. Otherwise will use Battle Loadout. [ Default: OFF ]
Use Siege Loadout In Hideouts
Use Siege Loadout in Sally out during Siege. Otherwise will use Battle Loadout. [ Default: ON ]
Use Siege Loadout In Sally Out
Use Siege Loadout in outside battle during Siege. Otherwise will use Battle Loadout. [ Default: OFF ]
Use Siege Loadout In Siege Outside
Use full Siege Loadout. Otherwise will use Battle Loadout with populated Siege Loadout pieces. [ Default: OFF ]
Enforce Full Set
Outfit Parts
When not enforcing full set, uses the mount and harness pieces from battle loadout. Otherwise will still enforce mount and harness pieces from Siege Loadout. [ Default: OFF ]
Use Battle Loadout Mount and Harness

When OFF, loadout buttons on inventory screen will be above mount swap buttons and hints near the center. When ON, loadout buttons will be below the mount swap buttons and above the Cancel,Reset, Done button bar. [ Default: OFF ]
Buttons below mount swap
Button Layout
